headline: Evaluating AppLovin (APP): Is There Still Value After a 12% Pullback and 3-Month Surge?
summary: AppLovin (APP) shares have taken investors on a ride lately. The stock saw a dip this week, giving back 5% over the last day and down 12% from last week. Despite these declines, it has posted gains of 8% for the past month and a remarkable 79% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for AppLovin. Zooming out, AppLovin’s 1-year total shareholder return is an eye-catching 314%, with momentum accelerating sharply in recent months. Moves like these suggest investors are warming up to its...
